EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ Kevlar ®/Nomex® Webbing and Netting
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Kevlar ®/Nomex® Webbing and Netting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
DuPont manufactures the fiber. We have customers that take our product and manufacture netting and webbing.
Below is a list of customers that the team came up with that does netting and webbing. Let us know if we can be of any other assistance.
Netting
Bally Ribbon www.ballyribbon.com Mutual Industries www.mutualindustries.com Murdock Webbing www.murdockwebbing.com Hope Global www.hopeglobal.com Rhode Island Textiles www.ritextile.com Highland Industries http://www.highlandindustries.com
Kevlar Mesh
*Team Textile 401-762-1500 http://www.teamtextiles.com/
*Hope Global Tel: (401) 333-8990 Fax: (401) 334-6442 info@hopeglobal.com
*A&P Technology 4595 East Tech Drive Cincinnati, OH 45245 513-688-3286"
Fabric Development PH- 215 536-1420 Fax 215-536-1154 sales@fabricdevelopment.com
Thank you for your visit to DuPont websites which provide additional information about Nomex®, Kevlar®, Tyvek® and other DuPont products.
DuPont Protection Solutions
This source list is designed to present a representative group of suppliers. It may not necessarily include all the companies selling or making these products and is subject to revision at any time. It is not an endorsement of any specific manufacturer.
